Lines.Speaker: Greef Karga
Lines.Text: Oh that was fast! Did you catch’em all?

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: They withstood a bit. I had to bring them cold

Lines.Speaker: Greef Karga
Lines.Text: No worries mate. Here is your money. *Gives a bunch of Imperial Credits*

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: Wait, these are Imperial Credits

Lines.Speaker: Greef Karga
Lines.Text: They are still valuable and spent

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: The empire is gone, I don’t know if you heard about It. The value of these credits is decreasing rapidly

Lines.Speaker: Greef Karga
Lines.Text: It’s all I got

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: Fine

Lines.Speaker: Greef Karga
Lines.Text: We have a deal then! Why don’t you take a drink and relax a little bit?

Lines.Speaker: Greef Karga
Lines.Text: I guess that’s a resounding no. Well, let’s see what I have

Lines.Speaker: Greef Karga
Lines.Text: Mmm… One water smuggler, another water smuggler...,

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: I’ll take them all

Lines.Speaker: Greef Karga
Lines.Text: Wow wait! There are other members of the Guild. This is all I have

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: What’s your higher bounty then?

Lines.Speaker: Greef Karga
Lines.Text: Not much. Around 5.000

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: That won’t even cover fuel these days.

Lines.Speaker: Greef Karga
Lines.Text: Well, there is one job

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: Let’s see the pug

Lines.Speaker: Greef Karga
Lines.Text: No pug. Face to face. Direct commission. Deep pocket. Just for you

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: Underworld?

Lines.Speaker: Greef Karga
Lines.Text: I don’t know. All I know is there is no chain code. Do you want the chit or not? All instructions are in this hologram. Hope to see you soon! *Hands a hologram to Mando*

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: *Takes the hologram, It has an imperial stamp on It and actives It*

Lines.Speaker: The Client
Lines.Text: Greetings Bounty Hunter. If you are listening to this message I can understand two things. One, that Greef Karga thinks you are the best in the parsec and two, that you are expensive. Very expensive. Indeed, that is not a problem we may have to involve ourselves in. I guess you have no clue or information about what you are looking for. Unfortunately, neither do I, at least from the point of view of localization. Let me tell you all you need to know. I’m afraid this job dictates a less traditional agreement. About the chain code, we can only provide you 4 digits, Its age. You are looking for a 50 years old creature, Its last localization was in Arvala-7, a couple of days ago. With that little information, a man of your skill should make a profitable work out of this. About the bounty, I need It alive. Although, I acknowledge that bounty hunting is a complicated profession. This being the case, proof of termination is also acceptable for a lower fee. It is good to restore the natural order of things after a period of such disarray, don't you agree? That is all. Contact Greef when you finish the job, I have a tones of Beskar waiting for you upon the delivery of the asset. End of transmission
